content.html: I will not allow this or any other attack on the community to drive me back into the shadows of society. Although #oslopride today is now cancelled, I will take every opportunity to show my Pride and fight for tolerance and equality. 🏳️‍🌈 #oslopride #oslove #londonpub
content.value:
I will not allow this or any other attack on the community to drive me back into the shadows of society. 
Although #oslopride today is now cancelled, I will take every opportunity to show my Pride and fight for tolerance and equality. 🏳️‍🌈 
#oslopride #oslove #londonpub

content.html:
There was a shooting outside of a lgbtq+ pub in Oslo last night, specifically against lgbtq+ folks. This is so fucked, the parade is now cancelled, and people are dead. I really don’t have any words, but also this shouldn’t be drowned out by other news and forgotten. 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🇳🇴
twitter.com/richwooduk/sta…
content.value:
There was a shooting outside of a lgbtq+ pub in Oslo last night, specifically against lgbtq+ folks.

This is so fucked, the parade is now cancelled, and people are dead.

I really don’t have any words, but also this shouldn’t be drowned out by other news and forgotten.

🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🇳🇴
